general.gigTitle: design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business

sellerCard.description:
Hi, I’m Spencer, the founder of Techie Techniques, a Florida-based web development company.

With over 8 years of experience, I specialize in creating custom WordPress websites that focus on usability, responsiveness, and aesthetics to help businesses grow online. My core strengths are in WordPress, HTML, and CSS, and I can also integrate JavaScript and PHP as needed to meet project goals.

I’m passionate about simplifying the development process and building long-term client relationships through excellent service. Let’s work together to bring your project to life!

Available:
M - F, 9a - 5p

description.content:
In search of an innovative and effective WordPress Website for your business?


Hi, I'm Spencer a five-star WordPress provider ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. 


My journey in design and web development has been a passion that turned into a profession. With over seven (7) years of experience, I'm excited to bring your vision to life!


What to expect:


A full-fledged website, primed for launch in your niche or target audience - IT company, e-commerce, real estate, and so on.


A distinctive and clean design.


Extensive revisions - and yes, it's truly extensive! I offer extensive amendments.


Working with a pleasant and humble professional, who prioritizes your satisfaction and the success of your project.


After the project is marked as complete, I'll still be here, offering you support and addressing any questions you might have for an additional two weeks.


Do note that the above packages do not include the cost of any 3rd party resources that your site may need (such as hosting, domain, theme, etc.).


Remember, your business's growth is my primary goal. Let's design and develop your success story!


*Please reach out to me prior to ordering to discuss your site*

slide.name: design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business
design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business
design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to contact you first?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. Making sure to contact me first will allow us to assess the suitability of the project you want and also the package (or custom package) required to make it completely successful.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help me out with my domain and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will be happy to help you out with your hosting and domain requirements. Just ask about it when we chat.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long will it take to build my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The standard time line varies greatly depending on what exactly you need to have done. There are many factors to take into account, to name but a few - the size and complexity of the project, the speed at which content is given, and speed at which revisions are given back.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to update the website myself once it is finished?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes of course you can! Being able to update and change the website on your own is a great reason to have a WordPress website - it can be as simple or as complicated as you need. You will have full and unlimited access to be able to add, edit and remove whatever you need or see fit.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much input do I have in the website design process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A lot! Your input and feedback is crucial to the successful customization of your website. We will begin the process with a lot of questions about your needs, your likes, your wants, and work alongside you to develop just the right style, design and functionality.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Who provides the content, text, copywriting for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You do! It is best if the majority of the content comes from you as who knows your business better? We are always happy to give title suggestions and alternatives if needed. If you require a dedicated copywriter for your website you can add it in the gig extras.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I add extra pages during the build?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes of course, custom pages are able to added at any point through the build through the use of the gig "extras".

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the difference between your website packages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The website packages are designed to be suitable for a range of needs and criteria and the packages can be selected as needed. If you require something outside of the packages then this can be created using a custom order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will Google be able to find my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: When the website is created we will build in the basic Search Engine Optimization features, but you can opt to have us create your XML site map, optimize the headers and meta data and register you on Google. If you require the later then this is available as an SEO gig extra.

packageList.title: Basic one (1) page website
packageList.description: As per the pre-order meeting, a website customized to suit your unique needs will be developed.

reviews.comment: Brought our vision to life effortlessly! Every request was handled with ease, exceeding our expectations. Highly recommend and will definitely rely on him for any future additions.
Prompt, professional, proficient - Spencer  was a pleasure to engage on my project.
Spencer is a true professional and excellent work product.
Spencer was very helpful when I had issues with my hosting service. he fixed the problem quickly and explained what was going on every step of the way.
